summary: The document outlines the criteria for escalation to the Americas Region Reputational Risk Committee (ARRC) at Deutsche Bank. It details the processes for addressing reputational risk issues within business and infrastructure functions, emphasizing the need for pre-execution approval and monthly reporting to the ARRC.
keyFacts: The document is marked as confidential and is intended for internal use only.
It discusses escalation paths for reputational risk issues within Deutsche Bank.
The ARRC is responsible for reviewing and resolving reputational risk issues.
